'''Lotus Heads''' are a [[Cooking Ingredient]] found in the wild all over [[Liyue]].

==How to Obtain==
Lotus Heads grow in pools of water throughout Liyue, and are most common near [[Luhua Pool]], [[Huaguang Stone Forest]] and [[Stone Gate]].

See the Video Guides section or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=166 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
